entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Yorkton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -21.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yorkton Airport 5:41 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -21.8°C
Pressure: 102.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -25.1°C
Wind: SE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023
